briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom device data structure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called on app startup, reload, restart etc to initialize non-zero data.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom device(s).

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called at initialization and allows the custom layer to provide specific functionality to initialize internal objects.
if successful, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to uninitialize custom device(s).

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called in preparation for loading a new configuration, allowing the custom layer to do whatever it needs with the current configuration before reconfiguration, if anything. Also, called in cleanup to close and uninitialize device resources.
if successful, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom events.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called in init event before CFE_EVS_Register to add custom events to the event filter table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function must be defined, but not all custom layers will do anything in this function.

parameterdescription.para: The current event table to modify.

simplesect.para: number of events written to the filter table and -1 for failure i.e. CFE_EVS_MAX_EVENT_FILTERS reached.

briefdescription.para: Read magnetometer values from the HMC5883.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns raw X, Y, and Z values from the HMC5883.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Apply any required rotation of the sensor x, y, and z axis.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will apply rotation to match the orientation of the sensor on the vehicle.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Apply any required rotation of the sensor x, y, and z axis.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will apply rotation to match the orientation of the sensor on the vehicle.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will complete a "who am i" check of the device.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sets the configuration register B gain gain configuration bits.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function gets the current configuration register B gain gain configuration bits.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Check the value of the sensor field range (gain).

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function checks and if the value isn't found sets the configuration register B gain gain configuration bits.

parameterdescription.para: The desired bit mask to check.

simplesect.para: for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sets the configuration register A for data output rate and measurement configuration.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Check the value of the sensor configuration.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function checks and if the value isn't found sets the configuration register A for data output rate and measurement configuration.

parameterdescription.para: The desired bit mask to check.

simplesect.para: for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Get the value of the sensor configuration.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function gets the current configuration.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Read temperature values from a HMC5983.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns raw temperature from the HMC5883.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function returns the current platform rotation.
